data.title: BI On Hadoop - What Are Your Options - Presentation 1
data.meta_description: BI on Hadoop_ What are your options_ Presentation 1 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses different options for business intelligence (BI) on big data. It describes three major approaches: ETL to RDBMS, monolithic (all-in-one) solutions, and SQL-on-Big Data. For ETL to RDBMS, data is extracted, transformed, and loaded from a big data store like HDFS into a relational database for analysis. Monolithic solutions provide both data visualization and execution capabilities within a single software platform. SQL-on-Big Data utilizes a SQL query engine sitting on top of a big data platform to enable BI tools to directly query the data.
data.text: BI On Hadoop - What Are Your Options - Presentation 1
